organizations: University of Texas at El Paso
lead_paragraph: Derrick Caracter was a basketball prodigy in high school who never lived up to his promise. Now, at UTEP, he has found a measure of success.
snippet: Derrick Caracter was a basketball prodigy in high school who never lived up to his promise. Now, at UTEP, he has found a measure of success.
